ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: The face pic in inv  in the old GUI is black for everyone now. This is what passes for normal. ... From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
ygData.messageBody:
The face pic in inv  in the old GUI is black for everyone now. This is what passes for normal.
----- Original Message -----
From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 21, 2002 12:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Question

On 20 Aug 2002 at 13:41, Deidre Choksy wrote:

> I just reinstalled directx 8.1 and updated my video card to the latest
> driver. Nothing happened! My character's face still gets all messed up
> whenever I zone. The picture of my character in the inventory is pure black.
> And even when I'm at the character selection screen my character's face's
> are all screwed up!

did you do a full scan of the files, already? maybe some files are broken. when you start EQ; before hitting "play",
use the "advanced" button, and do a "Complete File Check". this takes some minutes, but it _may_ find corrupted
files.


good luck
  - bilt
--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr


Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
